title: Frame Rate Drop after Patch 5.9! Riot Please Respond!
body:
So I finally got two days off work after 2 weeks straight, and I sit down to play some LoL. Loads up (first time too after a rough patch of not being able to load the launcher over a period of a few months). There's an update? Oh well, I don't mind waiting a few minutes for my weekend wind down. I'm sure Riot is making the game better and more enjoyable for all! :D

After a few minutes I start it up, and get ready to try out my new Blitz AP Jungler build. I get into game and… 01 Frames Per Second. Huh? Oh well this happens at the start of every game. It'll pick up any second. *30 seconds later* Hmm, still hovering around 11 fps. Maybe I'm lagging? Nope?

Long story short, ff at 20 and an angry team. I changed no settings, nothing on my computer… OTHER than downloading the 5.9 patch. I go from running good quality settings for everything and running at around 60 fps, to the same and only being able to run 01-11 fps. Absolutely unplayable. Even dropping to default settings then low quality for all settings, it only picked up slightly to around 20-30 fps. Even in the tutorial mode the problem persisted.

I'm going to try and troubleshoot the problem and will report if anything works back here. Hopefully someone here knows wtf is going on (Riot please! I play this game every single day, please I just want to relax this weekend).

Is anyone else having this issue? I've read it's happened before on boards in previous patches. Please help! :..(

UPDATE:

It's all fixed now. I repaired the game via launch screen, which seemed the most logical thing to do, and retarted my computer. It's now running at a full 60fps. If you're having similar issues, I'd start here.

replies.body: Since patch 5.9 i have had stuttering and freezing in game and have spoken to others with the same issue. I always have a stable ping, around 25-30 and my computer is high end ,please fix its costing me games ! Ps: I also like turtles but was unable to vote on both.
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.

Same thing is happening to me. I was playing perfectly fine yesterday and then I get on this morning and start up a match with my same settings and whenever I started attacking or being attacked, my fps would drop immediately or my game would freeze. I really want to know what's happening because it wasn't doing this yesterday and now it is.
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.
Have you recently updated your OS and graphics driver(s)?

No idea what that means lol. If you mean, is my Mac up to date? Then yes, it is. I doubt that's the problem though, really? I mean I was literally playing League about 12 hours previous to the update and it was fine. The *only* thing that was changed in that period was patch 5.9.

It could be that some coding implemented in the latest update didn't decompose gracefully with older drivers, hence meaning an update would be all you need to do to fix it. Best to just get this solution out the way before diving really deep into it.

For future reference, OS means Operating System, which is the underlying software which allows you to run programs on your computer. Anything from Apple uses their proprietary iOS, so just saying "Apple" would do in most cases.

Have you reset your computer? Another common solution to get out the way, especially if you're a person who makes use of hibernate.

Are you experiencing issues with any other games/applications on your system?

Been having FPS problems for a while now, I usually run around 200-300 FPS but randomly when I go to last hit, trade, fight, ward or even moves it drops down to 30 and freezes for like half a second while my ping is unaffected. I have tried changing all the settings, windowed, borderless and full screened, turned to sound off and on and even re-installed multiple times. It is starting to become a big issue where I have lost game winning fights just coz I got locked up for a second. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I've been experiencing this problem ever since this morning now, makes it challenging to play properly ;-;.
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.
Same problem here... I don't know what to do... :/

i like that riot always thinks its the players internet or computer thats causing the lags .... i too started to get low fps after patch 5.9.
 before the patch i was always running 60 fps on high settings.. now i cant even run on the lowest and get a staple fps... 

sry if my english sucks im not english :)
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.

Same problem with you...i cant play with 1 fps please can you tell me how did you fixed it

(sorry for my english ){{summoner:3}}
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.

Same to me but in the past few days... I was always running smooth 200 fps now i cant even 40 and im lagging like crazy in teamfights and no its not my internet i always have 40 ping... I run i7 processor, 8gb ram, amd radeon 2gb graphics on my Toshiba laptop... Its really annoying i've tryed evrything to solve the problem from reinstalling the game to troubeshooting from the riot website... Any hep please???
{{item:1051}} {{item:1051}}
What happens if you disable your sound? Does that improve it back to what it was? It's not a solution, but I'd like to see if it's audio related.

My frame rate drops drastically from capped at 60 to 15  then jumps back up, then drops again. ping stays the same so not an internet connection issue. 

plz halp
Could you provide your computer specs, including graphics card, OS and ISP?
